# PED::SET_PED_ALERTNESS

## Summary
Sets a peds alertness state

## Parameters
* **PED_INDEX** ped
* **ALERTNESS_STATE** alertState

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
value ranges from 0 to 3.
